title: Developers now have until July 2022 to fill out Play Store’s “Data safety” section
content:
In a bid to give Android users deeper insight into how apps collect, share and protect user data, Google announced a new Data safety section in Play Store back in May. Later on, Google detailed what info app developers would need to disclose in the safety section and rolled out a new form in the

The post Developers now have until July 2022 to fill out Play Store’s “Data safety” section appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Google is giving Android app developers more time to submit the Data safety form for the Play Store's upcoming safety section.
